update message_remind set try_time = try_time + 1, update_time = now() where id in
#{item}

update message_remind set status = #{status}, update_time = now() where id in
#{item}

update message_remind set status_message =
when #{item.id} then concat(ifnull(status_message,''),#{item.statusMessage})
where id in
#{item.id}
